titles.title: Okhissa Lake Rural Economic Development Land Conveyance Act
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer to Scenic Rivers Development Alliance certain National Forest System land in the State of Mississippi.
Okhissa Lake Rural Economic Development Land Conveyance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Okhissa Lake Rural Economic Development Land Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Department of Agriculture, upon request by the Scenic Rivers Development Alliance, to convey to the alliance approximately 150 acres of specified National Forest System lands in Franklin County, Mississippi.
